title: Abu Dhabi’s G42 in $1bn deal to develop sovereign AI and data centres in Vietnam
description: Agreement to see the UAE company partner with local firms to develop AI infrastructure across the South-East Asian nation

title: Try not to make AI or mobile phone the master: PM Modi tells students
description: Prime Minister Modi advises students to use technology wisely, urging them not to let AI and mobile phones become their masters. In Pariksha Pe Charcha, he emphasizes the importance of discipline, good sleep, and effective communication for success.

title: Character AI users report lag and slow chat loading, fix in the works
description: Character AI users are dealing with frustrating lag and slow chat loading times that have persisted for several days now. Multiple users on the r/CharacterAI subreddit have reported that chats are taking significantly longer to load after clicking on a bot. One user mentioned that what used to take less than ten seconds now feels [...]The post Character AI users report lag and slow chat loading, fix in the works appeared first on PiunikaWeb.

title: The Bharat Breakthrough: How Sarvam AI Built the Sovereign Tech That Surpassed Google and ChatGPT
description: Sarvam AI, a Bengaluru-based startup, has launched sovereign AI models trained on Indian languages and contexts. Its Sarvam Audio and Sarvam Vision systems outperform Google and OpenAI in benchmarks, offering advanced speech recognition, document parsing, and direct speech-to-command capabilities.

title: AI Is Breaking Jobs Into Tasks, And That Changes Everything
description: AI is not automating jobs in one go; it is disassembling them into tasks, deleting repetitive work, and forcing new human responsibilities to emerge.
